description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k4k","text":"Preparation of Amplicons for deep sequencing is based on two PCR steps. The genomic loci of interest is enriched  in a first PCR including a stubber sequence to both ends of the molecule. For the subsequent barcoding PCR the stubber sequence is targeted and the full NGS sequencing adapter including dual barcodes are introduced to the molecule ends, enabling Illumina sequencing on all instruments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hs32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jolt","text":"By default we recommend a 150 PE sequencing workflow and amplicon size including the specific primer binding sites should not extend 280bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bk5p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6edqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpbpa","text":"Schematic {"blocks":[{"key":"f3lgv","text":"Confirm proper amplification by running a 2% agarose gel with 5 µL of purified product. Alternatively, you can run the gel on the PCR, before purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hlp2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6e5u","text":"The first PCR product is often impure, especially when amplifying more complex samples (e.g. mouse samples). Confirm presence of the desired band before proceeding with the second PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1453h","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e96oj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40ifr","text":"Measure concentration of first PCR with the Qubit Spectrophotometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"789or","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp0v1","text":"For qubit, use 2 µL Purified PCR per sample, and the '1x DNA HS kit'. Follow manufacturer's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhqu7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6da65","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9au5n","text":"NOTE: The qubit assay can be readily adapted to use with a plate reader, for higher throughput.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":3971,"mol_weight":0,"name":" Qubit® 3.0 Fluorometer","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/ca/en/home/industrial/spectroscopy-elemental-isotope-analysis/molecular-spectroscopy/fluorometers/qubit/qubit-fluorometer.html","sku":"Q33216","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"4A497A71D10241FFBAB2D5DDFF858FFF","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

steps.section: Prepare the second PCR from 10 ng of product from the first PCR
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6u89","text":"Place 10 ng of first PCR product into a second 50 µL Q5 polymerase master mix with the Illumina PCR primers containing dual 8nt barcodes. This PCR completes the Illumina adapter to be sequenced on a Illumina MiSeq sequencer. steps.section: Purify the Second PCR using SPRI beads
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1aefd","text":"Purify 50 µL PCR with 0.8X SPRI beads, eluting in 30 µL water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"833gb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kqcv","text":"   or homemade beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"epkn9","text":"Use SPRI beads at RT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nmf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"459jl","text":"Add 40 µL SPRI beads to each 50 µL PCR (0.8X ratio), mix thoroughly, and incubate for 5-8 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gc0n","text":"Place on magnetic stand, wait for solution to clear (~1-2 minutes).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v8i0","text":"Remove clear supernatant.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41s00","text":"Wash 2x with 80% Ethanol: Add 200 µL ethanol solution (wait 30 seconds), remove, add 200 µL ethanol solution (wait 30 seconds), remove.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45kkr","text":"Remove residual ethanol with a P20 pipette. Remove plate from magnetic stand.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf5a0","text":" Allow sample to visibly dry, 3-5 minutes. Do not over-dry the samples as this can affect the yield.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6740n","text":" Re-suspend beads in 30 µL PCR-grade water. Place on magnetic stand.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5luv","text":" Allow solution to clear. Remove 27 µL of clear supernatant (contains DNA) and place in a new 96 well plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":957333,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Sera-Mag Select","linfor":"","url":"https://www.cytivalifesciences.com/en/ch/shop/molecular-biology/pcr-and-amplification/kits-and-ready-to-go-beads/sera-mag-select-p-10218","sku":"29343052","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"099A18A0468211EDAE469F6B3537F05F","entries":null,"vendor":{"id":51,"name":"GE Healthcare","link":"http://www.gehealthcare.com","is_requested":false,"image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}
